components.description: Schwinn N'Litened Silver Label Custom Drawn Aluminum with Trial-Tuned geometry, Epicenter seat stays, replaceable hanger and disc brake mount.
Pro Max 3-Finger Die Cast Alloy with reach adjuster
TruVativ X-Flow alloy arms, 42-32-22 Cr-Mo rings
SR Suntour XCM202 31.8 dual pull (F), SRAM SX4 (R)
Alex PC-19 double wall alloy with finished sidewalls to improve wet braking, 32H
ATB Resin body, Boron steel axle, Steel cage. Toe-clip adaptable.
Trail Tuned, cast alloy threadless 15 degree rise with forged front load cap.
Trial Tuned super soft with two tone cover
Alloy Low-Profile QR with forged clamp
